summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Reserved Member CRM feature. All backend APIs (22/22 tests passed - 100%) and frontend UI functionality working correctly. Features tested: Admin direct add, Staff request, Approve/Reject workflow, Duplicate prevention (case-insensitive), Move reservation, Delete reservation, Filter and Search.
passed_tests: Admin login with correct credentials
Staff login with correct credentials
GET /api/staff-users - Admin can get staff list
GET /api/staff-users - Staff can view staff list
POST /api/reserved-members - Admin can add reservation directly (status=approved)
POST /api/reserved-members - Admin requires staff_id (400 error without)
GET /api/reserved-members - Get all reserved members
GET /api/reserved-members?status=approved - Filter by status
GET /api/reserved-members?status=pending - Filter by status
POST /api/reserved-members - Staff can request reservation (status=pending)
Staff can view all approved reservations
Duplicate customer name rejected with 409 error
Case-insensitive duplicate check works
Staff cannot request already reserved name
PATCH /api/reserved-members/{id}/approve - Admin can approve pending request
PATCH /api/reserved-members/{id}/reject - Admin can reject pending request (deletes record)
Cannot approve already processed member (400 error)
PATCH /api/reserved-members/{id}/move - Admin can move reservation to different staff
Move to non-existent staff fails with 404
DELETE /api/reserved-members/{id} - Admin can delete reservation
Delete non-existent member fails with 404
Staff cannot delete reservations (403 Forbidden)
UI: Admin Reserved Member CRM page loads correctly
UI: Stats cards (Total, Pending, Approved) display correctly
UI: Add New Reservation form with customer name and staff dropdown
UI: Filter buttons (All, Pending, Approved) work
UI: Search functionality works
UI: Reservations table displays correctly
UI: Approve button works (checkmark icon)
UI: Reject button works (X icon)
UI: Move modal opens and works correctly
UI: Delete button works with confirmation
UI: Duplicate prevention shows error toast
UI: Staff Reserved Member CRM page loads correctly
UI: Staff sees Request form (no staff dropdown)
UI: Staff filter buttons (All Reserved, My Pending Requests)
UI: Staff request shows 'Pending Approval' status
UI: Info box about visibility to all staff
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during testing (TEST_ prefixed records)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Reserved Member CRM feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: POST/GET/PATCH/DELETE /api/reserved-members, /api/staff-users. Admin can add directly (approved), staff requests go to pending. Duplicate check is case-insensitive. Admin can approve/reject/move/delete. All staff can see approved reservations.
